## Introduction
Plotting aparc areas from Freesurfers segmentations using ggplot2 is a handy way of displaying results or grouping of aparc data.

## Basic use
The function `ggaparc()` comes with the `MOAS` package for LCBC in-house use, but it is not limited in it's use to LCBC data, it can
be used in many different ways.
As it is based in the ggplot2 format, it is recommended to get a little familiarized with with [plotting data with ggplot2](http://r-statistics.co/Complete-Ggplot2-Tutorial-Part1-With-R-Code.html).
